original_text: The fear of you and the dread of you shall be upon every beast of the earth and upon every bird of the heavens, upon everything that creeps on the ground and all the fish of the sea. Into your hand they are delivered.
korean_text: 땅의 모든 짐승과 공중의 모든 새와 땅에 기는 모든 것과 바다의 모든 물고기가 너희를 두려워하며 너희를 무서워하리니 이것들은 너희의 손에 붙였음이니라

sentences.original_text: The fear of you and the dread of you
shall be upon every beast of the earth
and upon every bird of the heavens
upon everything that creeps on the ground
sentences.korean_translation: 땅에 기는 모든 것 위에 있고

sentences.original_text: and all the fish of the sea
Into your hand they are delivered.
